member.param: A object whose links must be removed from the current link container.

summary.para: Fires after the Ribbon's context menu is closed.
Fires before the Ribbon's context menu is displayed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Ribbon.RibbonControl.RibbonStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style of the RibbonControl. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A enumeration value that specifies the paint style.

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to show a bar that displays the Ribbon Quick Access Toolbar.

member.value: A RibbonTitleBarVisibility value that specifies the visibility of the ribbon's bar that displays the Quick Access Toolbar.

summary.para: Fires when a page is selected.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Ribbon.RibbonControl.SelectedPageName

member.value: A string that specifies the selected page's name.
